# Talent Evaluation Dashboard - Copilot Instructions

This is an interactive Talent Evaluation Dashboard for the Marketing Organization at Sam's Club.

## Project Overview
- **Purpose**: Assess performance ratings and analyze supporting documentation for bias and objectivity
- **Rating System**: Three-tier (Exemplary, Successful, Opportunity)  
- **Focus Areas**: Key Priorities, Results & Impact, Collaboration & Influence, Growth & Development, Looking Ahead
- **Bias Detection**: Identifies subjective vs objective feedback patterns

## Key Features
- Performance rating input and tracking
- Bias detection algorithms
- Objective feedback analysis
- Marketing-specific assessment criteria
- Interactive dashboard interface

## Tech Stack
- React with TypeScript
- Modern CSS for styling
- Chart.js for data visualization
- Local storage for data persistence

## Development Notes
- Focus on objectivity in performance evaluation
- Implement bias detection for "Easy Rater" and similar patterns
- Ensure accessibility and responsive design
- Follow React best practices and TypeScript conventions
